Package kleingarten.news

Class NewsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • kleingarten.news.NewsController
  • @Controller
class NewsController
extends Object
    A controller to handle web requests to manage NewsEntrys.

      • index

        @GetMapping(path="/")
public String index()
        Handles requests to the application root URI.
        Returns:
        a redirect string

      • home

        @GetMapping(path="/home")
String home​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Handles requests to access the home page. Obtains all currently available NewsEntrys and puts them into the Model that's used to render the view.
        Parameters:
        model - that's used to render the view
        Returns:
        a view name

      • addEntry

        @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'Vorstandsvorsitzender\') || hasRole(\'Stellvertreter\')")
@PostMapping(path="/home/news/addEntry")
String addEntry​(@RequestParam("text")
                String text)
        Handles requests to create a new NewsEntry.
        Parameters:
        text - for NewsEntry
        Returns:
        a redirect string

      • deleteEntry

        @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'Vorstandsvorsitzender\') || hasRole(\'Stellvertreter\')")
@PostMapping(path="/home/news/deleteEntry/{id}")
String deleteEntry​(@PathVariable("id")
                   long id)
        Deletes a NewsEntry.
        Parameters:
        id - of the NewsEntry to delete
        Returns:
        a redirect string

      • editEntry

        @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'Vorstandsvorsitzender\') || hasRole(\'Stellvertreter\')")
@PostMapping(path="/home/news/editEntry/{id}")
String editEntry​(@PathVariable("id")
                 long id,
                 @RequestParam("text")
                 String text)
        Updates a NewsEntry.
        Parameters:
        id - of the NewsEntry to delete
        text - for the updated entry
        Returns:
        a redirect string
